review: Awesome device for streaming.  I cant give it a perfect rating since it doesnt have amazon instant (and possibly will never have).
author: Justin Co

review: I love this device. I watch cast either Netflix, hulu plus and Pandora from my iPhone 5 to my television every single day. No need to spend a stack of money on a smart TV :)
author: ruby

review: Cool product does what it says. Some youtube videos aren't to clean but that's with the video quality itself.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Easy peasy... for me at least. Not so much for the rest of my family tho. I also bought them Apple TV. They're using Apple TV instead of this.
author: Old

review: Every TV should have Chromecast built-in.
author: Ryan Saldana

review: The manufactures absent from documentation I need assistance for My laptop driver. This is the reason I purchased it. Till I get assistance its worthless.
author: ajaxtalk

review: Not a very good device...it worked ok...but compared to Roku...its a "ZERO"...and I love Google....needs tons of work.
author: Amazon Customer

review: This is really cool if you don't have a smart TV and want to stream Netflix. Sometimes it doesn't connect up right away but just takes a little patience. I would love if you could stream amazon instant video with it.
author: Katie Robertson

review: worked just as expected, don't have any regrets
author: Hector
